title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag: Should the Bucs draft a QB in the 1st round? Will the Jets consider picking a WR at #4? Who will be the 1st kicker off the board (Football 4/11)
description:
It's Mailbag Monday, without Will Brinson. But that's okay as Ryan Wilson and John Breech are here to answer YOUR questions! The guys get in some Binson trash talk before answering several NFL Draft questions such regarding the Bucs interest in a QB and the Jets possibly taking Garrett Wilson at #4. Breech also gives his insight on who the first kicker chosen. Much more in the mailbag as well!

ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â

It's Mailbag Monday, without Will Brinson. But that's okay as Ryan Wilson and John Breech are here to answer YOUR questions! The guys get in some Binson trash talk before answering several NFL Draft questions such regarding the Bucs interest in a QB and the Jets possibly taking Garrett Wilson at #4. Breech also gives his insight on who the first kicker chosen. Much more in the mailbag as well!
